title: The Twenty-four Days Before Christmas
description: Vicky Austin's family does one special thing each day of December to prepare for Christmas. This year, they're also preparing for the birth of a new brother or sister, due after the New Year. Vicky is worried that the baby will come earlyâ€•what kind of Christmas Eve would it be without Mother to help them hang up stockings and sing everyone to sleep with carols?
author: Madeleine L'Engle
